title: Gold + Team looking for a Mid, and Support!
body:
Hello all, my name is Josh or Phonicz in game and I'm the Co-Captain of a League of Legends team. My team is one of many in a large community called Junior Bot Gaming,  and we take pride in that fact. We're looking for a talented Mid Laner and Support MAIN to join the family and to start progressing. Gold V and above is preferred but if you're Silver I or II and show a distinct desire to improve yourself you will be considered. 

The team is a family, but it's also a structured and organized team. By joining you agree to being at any and all practices OR letting me know the day before hand, you also agree to play champs you may be a bit uncomfortable with to secure our team comps. An interview will be conducted before the tryouts and while we're looking for skilled and talented players, attitude/dedication will play a big part of the tryout overall. 

If you're interested, DO NOT add me in game as this will result in your application being denied. Fill out your interest in a reply structured as followed.
Name:
IGN:
Age:
Availability:
Champ Pool:

Thank you everyone.

replies.body:
Name: James Brown
IGN: Jbdakidd23
Age:20
Availability: weekends and most nights after 4 eastern.
Champ Pool: Thresh, blitz, nautilus, leona, karma, nami, janna, soraka, lulu, sona, braum, alistar, brand, malz, zyra, bard, lux, morg, MF, taric, tahm.

   *my op.gg probably shows alot of thresh but I'm much better with more team oriented supports. Just play alot of him because it fun making solo q plays* was plat last season, haven't been able to climb back yet. Last team I was on I was the captain and co-shot caller.

Diamond Dancin
Gold 4 last season
Gold 2 Solo, Silver 5 flex. I dont play flex queue and when I do its with a bunch of my lower skilled friends.
No team experience
Strengths: Engaging, making calls, communication, and map awareness, ability to take criticism, and the want to learn the game .
Weaknesses: I have a lot to learn about the game.
Champ pool: When mid lane I pick Leblanc, Viktor and akali. . I am willing/ able to learn picks the team needs/wants
I am available at all times
I do have a mic.
Early morning bump. Looking mainly for Supports until all these midlaners are tried out! However feel free to still apply.

Name: Luke (Yes, I am named after Star Wars)
IGN: Talavin
Age: 16 (mature)
Availability: Complicated section; i am generally available most weekends and will make sure to notify if I cannot make a practice or whatever; if i know the schedule ahead of time i can plan for it :) Weekdays are doable but I need a set schedule so i can plan around it; pesky AP classes
